psf_reference.title: exposure is PSF Reference
psf_reference.description: This keyword indicates whether the exposure is intended to be used as a PSF reference observation for associated coronagraphic or AMI observations of science targets.
psf_reference.misc: Used in asn_pool_maker.py to fill a pool column for the asn generator to read.

self_reference_survey.title: self-referencing PSF
self_reference_survey.description: This keyword indicates whether this coronagraphic observation is to be regarded as part of a self-referencing survey, which means that it can be treated as both a science target observation and a reference PSF observation.
